videos.description: LeBron James gets the Lakers off to a hot start with three strong buckets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron impresses with six straight points) 2021/12/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron impresses with six straight points

videos.description: Tre Mann skies past Wayne Ellington for a vicious throwdown.

videos.description: LeBron James hustles for the loose ball and Russell Westbrook finds Carmelo Anthony wide open for the 3-pointer.
